Caption: Union Minister for Education Shri M. C. Chagla gives away the Siemens Prize for the year 1964-65 to Mr. Kanianthra Mani Chandy
Description: The Siemens Prize consisted of a bronze medal and a National Savings Certificate of the value of Rs. 75, which were given to the best student in electrical engineering. Chandy went on to do his Masters from New York University and Ph.D. from Massachusetts Institute of Technology, and went on to serve in the field of academics for over 40 years, having won several awards in the field and also from the University of Texas and Caltech, where he taught and guided over 30 Ph.D. students. He was given the Distinguished Alumnus Award of IIT-Madras in 2019.
